index.requestCodeReview:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the mentor request form
**UI Location**: Real-time Feedback Modal → No Automated Feedback → Mentoring Request Form (heading)
**When Users See This**: When the user opts to request a code review through the real-time feedback modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Request code review"
index.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel the mentoring request process
**UI Location**: Real-time Feedback Modal → No Automated Feedback → Mentoring Request Form (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user is filling out the form and decides not to proceed
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
index.submitForCodeReview:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit the mentor request
**UI Location**: Real-time Feedback Modal → No Automated Feedback → Mentoring Request Form (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user has completed the form and is ready to submit it for review
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Submit for code review"
index.onceYouSubmit:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about what happens after submitting the code review request
**UI Location**: Real-time Feedback Modal → No Automated Feedback → Mentoring Request Form (explanation paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring request form
**Technical Context**: This string is followed by a component displaying the median wait time. The phrase `Once you submit, your request will be open for a mentor to join and start providing feedback.` should remain unchanged and appear before the `MedianWaitTime` component.
**Current English**: "Once you submit, your request will be open for a mentor to join and start providing feedback."
